required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mesenchymal Stem Cells Infusion for aGVHD Prophylaxis Transplantation
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Study for Safety and Effectiveness Assessment of Bone Marrow Mesenchymal Stem Cell Infusion for Acute Graft-versus-host Disease Prophylaxis and Treatment After Allogenic Bone Marrow Transplantation

lead_sponsor.agency: National Research Center for Hematology, Russia

clinical_study.source: National Research Center for Hematology, Russia

oversight_info.authority: Russia: Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation

brief_summary.textblock: Infusion of Mesenchymal Stem Cell (MSC) at day of recovery after bone marrow transplant (BMT) for patients with AL, AA and MM for acute Graft-versus-host Disease (GVHD) prophylaxis and treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: Infusion of mesenchymal stem cells at day of recovery after BMT for patients with AL, AA and MM for acute GVHD prophylaxis and treatment. Infusion at dose 1 cells mln/kg at day of white blood cells recovery.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention

primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 30 day for 1 year after BMT

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every 30 day for 1 year after BMT
Every 30 day for 1 year after BMT
Every 30 day for 1 year after BMT

arm_group.description: infusion of Mesenchymal stem cells at dose 1 mln cells per kg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- allogenic BMT from related or unrelated donor
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe infection
- Relapse
- admission to ICU
- refusal of research
- patients with graft failure

results_reference.citation: Kuzmina LA, Petinati NA, Parovichnikova EN, Lubimova LS, Gribanova EO, Gaponova TV, Shipounova IN, Zhironkina OA, Bigildeev AE, Svinareva DA, Drize NJ, Savchenko VG. Multipotent Mesenchymal Stromal Cells for the Prophylaxis of Acute Graft-versus-Host Disease-A Phase II Study. Stem Cells Int. 2012;2012:968213. doi: 10.1155/2012/968213. Epub 2011 Dec 25.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: National Research Center for Hematology, Russia
